Issue.creator: jjason
Issue.summary: Update PoET SGX Build to Use Existing Debian Packages
Issue.description: The PoET SGX enclave code requires the json-c and cryptopp libraries as dependencies. Currently the code is manually built and libraries and headers are copied to a defined directory. There exist pre-built Debian packages for crypto++ and json-c. Migrate the code and build for PoET SGX to use these libraries.
